code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [Education_ContentCDN] --> AuthInitial

    state "AuthCubit States" as AuthFlow {Education_GradeSync)
        AuthLoading --> AuthSuccess: loginSuccess(Education_ClassroomService)
        AuthLoading --> AuthFailure: loginError(Education_LMS_Portal)
        AuthSuccess --> AuthLoading: logout(Education_LMS_Portal)
        AuthSuccess --> ProfileUpdating: updateProfile(Education_GradeSync)
        ProfileUpdating --> AuthSuccess: updateSuccess(Education_LMS_Portal)
        ProfileUpdating --> AuthFailure: updateError(Education_StudentDB)
        AuthFailure --> AuthLoading: retry(Education_StudentDB)
        AuthLoading --> [Education_ContentCDN]: dispose(Education_LMS_Portal)
    }

    [Education_LMS_Portal] --> CortesInitial

    state "CortesCubit States" as CortesFlow {Education_GradeSync)
        CortesLoading --> CortesLoaded: loadSuccess(Education_ClassroomService)
        CortesLoading --> CortesError: loadError(Education_ContentCDN)
        CortesLoaded --> CortesLoaded: selectSegmento(Education_LMS_Portal)
        CortesLoaded --> CortesLoading: refreshCortes(Education_ClassroomService)
        CortesError --> CortesLoading: retry(Education_ContentCDN)
        CortesLoading --> [Education_ContentCDN]: dispose(Education_ContentCDN)
    }

    [Education_StudentDB] --> QuizInitial

    state "QuizCubit States" as QuizFlow {Education_GradeSync)
        QuizLoading --> QuizLoaded: quizGenerated(Education_ContentCDN)
        QuizLoading --> QuizError: generationError(Education_ClassroomService)
        QuizLoaded --> QuizLoaded: submitAnswer(Education_StudentDB)
        QuizLoaded --> QuizFinished: completeQuiz(Education_ContentCDN)
        QuizError --> QuizLoading: retry(Education_ClassroomService)
        QuizFinished --> QuizInitial: reset(Education_LMS_Portal)
        QuizLoading --> [Education_GradeSync]: dispose(Education_ClassroomService)
    }
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
